title: Received a defective product.
description: I ordered a 190L single door fridge. When the item got delivered the agent said to wait for 2hrs before starting the fridge. After 2hrs when I plugged in the fridge and let it run for 24hrs. The fridge doesn't work, there's no cooling taking place. Also there is no staight forward way of getting the issue resolved. Please think twice before going for this purchase.

title: LG fridge you can go for it if space is the constraint
description: This product i purchase after reviewing the amazon all 190lts to 215lts and found by its comments and review the best in the beginning but once it landed to me feom the day of begining instead of Model 2022 which was being projected by them , it is working like the refrigerator which we used to have in 1990's.

title: Great experience with it, so far.
description: This is a very nice product with convertible freezer, super chill button, and ample storage. My previous fridge, a 210 litres direct cooling one, again from LG, is now more than 23 years old, and is still fully functional at my native place. That made me go for an LG again when I needed to buy a fridge at my work place. Hoping for a similar longevity for this one as well.

title: Great experience with it, so far.
description: This is a very nice product with convertible freezer, super chill button, and ample storage. My previous fridge, a 210 litres direct cooling one, again from LG, is now more than 23 years old, and is still fully functional at my native place. That made me go for an LG again when I needed to buy a fridge at my work place. Hoping for a similar longevity for this one as well.

description: I bought this product nearly 25 days ago. Initially it used to freeze the water even when kept in the door cabinet for bottles. Now the performance has degraded very badly. title: Samsung refrigerator
description: I have purchased this product in May 2022. But I am not satisfied with this fridge. This is the first time I have purchased any Samsung item. But I am highly disappointed. The cooling of the refrigerator is not upto the mark. Although it is spacious but the cooling part is not great. I have asked there engineer and compared it's cooling with my another Whirlpool fridge and he said that this fridge has some design issues due to which the cooling is low. Samsung has not provided the freezer as per the size of the fridge due to which cooling is not properly till the bottom. Actually Samsung should work on their design and made thorough testing before launching any product in the market.

title: Samsung refrigerator
description: I have purchased this product in May 2022. But I am not satisfied with this fridge. This is the first time I have purchased any Samsung item. But I am highly disappointed. The cooling of the refrigerator is not upto the mark. Although it is spacious but the cooling part is not great. I have asked there engineer and compared it's cooling with my another Whirlpool fridge and he said that this fridge has some design issues due to which the cooling is low. Samsung has not provided the freezer as per the size of the fridge due to which cooling is not properly till the bottom. Actually Samsung should work on their design and made thorough testing before launching any product in the market.

title: Value for money
description: The product comes with 4 star rating which consume 131 unit/year ,it is very silent and storage capacity is also good ,overall I am satisfied with the fridge ,try to maintain the gap between fridge placement and wall .dont go with the negative reviews just check the product at the time of delivery and if the product delivers with no damage then it is good product no issue in 2 month of uses.

title: Samsung Refrigerator
description: Nice colour and design is very modern. Storage capacity is not very spacious. Quality of trays and other plastic parts are not as my old Samsung refrigerator. Price is reasonable and the refrigerator is  value for money. Overall I am satisfied.

title: The Worst Product of Whirlpool - Very very less cooling, Very poor customer service
description: Have a bought this crystal clear 15 days back. From day 1 onwards, very  very low cooling. When I complained and asked for replacement,  their authorized service area Manager in Chennai - Pallavaram (Pandiyan) says that nowadays you cannot expect that quality of your old refrigerator from Whirlpool (previous one is also Mastermind double door whirl pool) and we cannot go for any replacement.  Since I already used whilpool, thinking that the same quality would be maintained by Whilrpool, this time also I went for W.pool Fridge only, without any 2nd though. Now I regret a lot for this.

Since I already used whilpool, thinking that the same quality would be maintained by Whilrpool, this time also I went for W.pool Fridge only, without any 2nd though. Now I regret a lot for this.

title: Don't ever buy!
description: The fridge has a 10 year compressor warranty but stopped working in 1 year. The LG customer care is the most pathetic & worst service I have come across. They sent a person after 3 days of raising a complaint. He said the compressor is not working & would need to be replaced. Its been 10 days now & even after endless calls to the LG customer care no one has come for the repair. They say the compressor has to be shipped from another place & there are many more customers waiting for the same. The fridge failed in the midst of a summer peak & we are left without a redress for the past 10 days! Dont ever trust LG.

title: Do not buy this refrigerator!
description: This is my take on refrigerator after using it for almost 2 years

title: Don't ever buy!
description: The fridge has a 10 year compressor warranty but stopped working in 1 year. The LG customer care is the most pathetic & worst service I have come across. They sent a person after 3 days of raising a complaint. He said the compressor is not working & would need to be replaced. Its been 10 days now & even after endless calls to the LG customer care no one has come for the repair. They say the compressor has to be shipped from another place & there are many more customers waiting for the same. The fridge failed in the midst of a summer peak & we are left without a redress for the past 10 days! Dont ever trust LG.

title: Good Refrigerator nd Having No problem.
description: It's a good refrigerator in this budget. Compressor is very silent and didn't create a little bit sound. Designing nd finishing is also good. Before purchasing it i read several negative reaview about this refrigerator that water leakage from back water tray, water droplet on the deepfreezer gate, but in my case no such a problem occur, Yes in starting few water droplets began to occur on deepfreezer zone and after few day it didn't happen. And I'll told you that water droplets occur due to moisture or when we switch off the refrigerator. Before it i owned LG refrigerator so i was also hesitating to switch to Samsung brand refrigerator but after purchasing i hadn't found any type of problem in this refrigerator. Overall it's a good product by Samsung.

Before purchasing it i read several negative reaview about this refrigerator that water leakage from back water tray, water droplet on the deepfreezer gate, but in my case no such a problem occur, Yes in starting few water droplets began to occur on deepfreezer zone and after few day it didn't happen. And I'll told you that water droplets occur due to moisture or when we switch off the refrigerator. Before it i owned LG refrigerator so i was also hesitating to switch to Samsung brand refrigerator but after purchasing i hadn't found any type of problem in this refrigerator. Overall it's a good product by Samsung.

title: Compressor Faulty
description: I've ordered this product on 18yh January 2022, after using 5 months the compressor is gone faulty and not working. Raised a complaint with Whirlpool and the service partner VIVA Solution based in Hosa Road, Bengaluru. Service partner sent a technician with the wrong compressor and he said sir I got the wrong model and it is not going to fit so I'll come back with the updated one and install. Now after 2 days they are saying that they have ordered the compressor which is going to take 2-3 days. Spoke with customer care and they said your refrigerator can be replaced completely. But Viva solution is denying tonreplace the fridge. Pls don't buy this product from any retailers, better to go with other brand products.

title: One of the worst refrigerator you will come across in life !!!
description: Do not go for the looks or how many doors or capacity this fridge has. After only one month of purchase , the refregirator has stopped cooling. Whirlpool customer service is even worse then their product...their are least bothered about their customer. Even after raising a complaint for two entire days , their team will not contact you to resolve it. If you call them again , rather then resolving your issue they will confuse you by saying that they have no control over their technician team . Whirlpool has some of the worst , unprofessional , rude , imbecile customer care executive in India.....pathetic and horrible. !!!!!!!

title: Received damage product
description: We received this refrigerator yesterday. On the top door there is a gap. Look into this picture. Please replace the item as soon as possible.

title: Compressor Faulty
description: I've ordered this product on 18yh January 2022, after using 5 months the compressor is gone faulty and not working. Raised a complaint with Whirlpool and the service partner VIVA Solution based in Hosa Road, Bengaluru. Service partner sent a technician with the wrong compressor and he said sir I got the wrong model and it is not going to fit so I'll come back with the updated one and install. Now after 2 days they are saying that they have ordered the compressor which is going to take 2-3 days. Spoke with customer care and they said your refrigerator can be replaced completely. But Viva solution is denying tonreplace the fridge. Pls don't buy this product from any retailers, better to go with other brand products.

title: Whilpool Genius
description: This company's Whirlpool Fridge is quite famous by its name.  Good enough but?  I took this fridge in April 2020, it was running fine then the fridge was closed for 8 months, and now if I turn it on, only the inside light is on and nothing is working.  Why and what happened like this, within 17 months, the fridge got spoiled..👎

title: Doesn’t last long the product got damaged in only 2 months
description: I have brought this product two months back. Previously it’s working good but now the grip of the main door is getting lost day by day. And the outer body is getting cooled due to leakage. And defrost will work very slowly. And there’s no assistance from Whirlpool customer service.

title: Whirlpool has lost it!
description: Bought it for 13.8k. Regretted it instantly; better products out there at the same price range. The toughened plastic is a hype. You keep a medium hot container and it will burn the tray plastic. Door has sufficient space to keep 2.5L bottles, good. title: Compressor of the refrigerator got dead in just 14 months
description: Utterly poor co. with poor quality. The company claims that the warranty is of 10 years. In any advertent event if your compressor gets dead as in my case the compressor gets dead within 14 months of purchase. You will be charged by the whirlpool service agent by way of gas filling. They will charge you 3k for this. We can imagine what sort of quality is giving the whirlpool. Poor company poor service.

title: Marketing gimmick.. not convertible.recurring maintenance .
description: Be aware..if you are buying fridge as convertible thinking you can use deep freezer as normal fridge then this is not the right for you. Deep freezer is always a deep freezer.. wastage of space and energy. This is a normal fridge and nothing special in this. Recurring maintenance.. you need to change deo/freshner every six months ~ Rs. 500 and change gas every two years Rs ~2500. Oveveall this is a normal old technology fridge with high maintenance..Only marketing...

title: Very poor quality. Not able to sustain even a year
description: It was working ok for a period of one year till it’s warranty. Later started to get low cooling then one day after 1 year 4 months stopped working. Technician  almost charged 1/5 of the amount to fix it . Almost most of the parts changed including gas. Service time is also close to a week. We are just a family of 3 and usage was very less only. Also we had 3 phase. Not worth facing similar problem with whirlpool washing machine also which was bought at almost same time

title: One of the best fridges in the market, the least usage of electricity compared to any brand!
description: I had done all my reviews online however purchased it locally as I wanted to see it for hands on experience, the Zeolite technology, Microblock technology and FreshFlow AirTower with Flexi Vents really work well in combination and since we been using this for over 2 years now...surprisingly it manages to keep veg fresh for even over 15 days than that advertised we were surprised ourselves. The Freshonizer is something unique and is excellent feature provided at this price, though we had bought it for approx 25k, now with covid everything is gone expensive and cant blame the new 27.5k TBH. Its automatic AI intelligent sensing is no match with even the best of brands.

title: Zero Customer technical service
description: We received the product with dent on freezer door. Then it was replaced. Now the compressor is not working for almost more than 15-20 days. Technicians are not able to fix it . The customer care services are pathetic. Nobody is responding properly. We are calling up almost everyday but all in vain. Amazon should stop services for these products if this is the attitude of the Samsung customer service. We want this freeze to be replaced. We don't want to get it repaired. We bought new freeze in good faith. My next step will be posting all this on Facebook, Twitter ..wherever I can .

title: Zero Customer technical service
description: We received the product with dent on freezer door. Then it was replaced. Now the compressor is not working for almost more than 15-20 days. Technicians are not able to fix it . The customer care services are pathetic. Nobody is responding properly. We are calling up almost everyday but all in vain. Amazon should stop services for these products if this is the attitude of the Samsung customer service. We want this freeze to be replaced. We don't want to get it repaired. We bought new freeze in good faith. My next step will be posting all this on Facebook, Twitter ..wherever I can .

title: Don't fall into the trap, this is not convertible
description: Fake marketing and fake product by Samsung. I lost piece of mind after buying this refrigerator. Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.

The only concern I have with the refrigerator is that there were two dents on the side and there is water vapour on the lower handle. The dents could be ignored as it doesn't seem like a big deal.

title: Seller DWANTECH sucks, think twice before getting anything from this seller
description: Being a Prime Member for a several years I’ve blindly trusted Amazon for its product nd service, but this time I was truly disappointed. Order this refrigerator RT37T4513S8/HL, which is a 2020 model got defective product twice, god knows whether it was refurbished, as it was a OPEN BOX DELIVERY I was able to return the product then n there. I wanted a refrigerator badly and offline stores were charging the printed mrp, I had trust issues with Flipkart but as I wasn’t have any option thought of giving a try. Luxe Black,

description: Fake marketing and fake product by Samsung. I lost piece of mind after buying this refrigerator. Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.

title: Fast delivry
description: As it was exchange i faced a problem because i was not aware that the installation comes with 24 hour but24 hour starts after delivery. How can we adjust to keep old things. N frozen things out for 24 hour.. I was so frustrated..as i was not aware and not prepared for this situation.. So wen its exchange dont expect installation along with the delivery

description: I'm happy with this purchase, the delivery team did a wonderful job getting the refrigerator to the first floor through narrow stairs. title: Don't fall into the trap, this is not convertible
description: Fake marketing and fake product by Samsung. I lost piece of mind after buying this refrigerator. Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.

title: Seller DWANTECH sucks, think twice before getting anything from this seller
description: Being a Prime Member for a several years I’ve blindly trusted Amazon for its product nd service, but this time I was truly disappointed. Order this refrigerator RT37T4513S8/HL, which is a 2020 model got defective product twice, god knows whether it was refurbished, as it was a OPEN BOX DELIVERY I was able to return the product then n there. I wanted a refrigerator badly and offline stores were charging the printed mrp, I had trust issues with Flipkart but as I wasn’t have any option thought of giving a try. Luxe Black,

title: Don't fall into the trap, this is not convertible
description: Fake marketing and fake product by Samsung. I lost piece of mind after buying this refrigerator. Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.

Unfortunately I did not check this during the first 10 days otherwise I would have returned this. Water becomes ice even if I switch off the freezer so raised an issue with customer support. First one technician has visited and told PCB has some issue and he replaced it. I found the same issue again so called customer care again. Another senior technical visited the place and told his diagnostic device is having problem after connecting to the refrigerator and he told he will get another device and left the place. From then I called customer support hundreds of times and they always responded saying technical person tried reaching you and your phone is not reachable. I got the same reply for morethan 10 days when I contacted support. One days finally after many escalations they sent a senior technician and this time the technician told this is how the refrigerator works and there is no issue with the refrigerator. I am totally confused with his statement because the demo person and other two technicians told me that it shouldn't work this way. But the 4th guy told me this is how it works and any thing you keep in freezer area it becomes ice no matter what option you select. This is totally opposite to convertible mechanism. So Samsung is cheating customers by selling non convertible refrigerator. Don't waste your money on this product.

title: Seller DWANTECH sucks, think twice before getting anything from this seller
description: Being a Prime Member for a several years I’ve blindly trusted Amazon for its product nd service, but this time I was truly disappointed. Order this refrigerator RT37T4513S8/HL, which is a 2020 model got defective product twice, god knows whether it was refurbished, as it was a OPEN BOX DELIVERY I was able to return the product then n there. I wanted a refrigerator badly and offline stores were charging the printed mrp, I had trust issues with Flipkart but as I wasn’t have any option thought of giving a try. Luxe Black,

Please don't buy it they don't attent to any call or support if it doesnot work.

title: Pathetic customer service or support for the product
description: Pathetic experience, never buy big appliances from amazon. As we can see they provide cheap price with ok quality but can't take a risk of buying online and experience a pathetic customer service or support. Have waited 2month for replacement, return closed, warrenty claim cancelled. Even heard from executive that probability of getting good product buying online is 50-50 chances.

title: After 1 month use
description: Working good till now, very low noice, good cooling (i live in jaipur, so it's very hot outside), sufficient space. Just 2 things which could be better - 1- only 2 trays in fridge so not able to use whole space in fridge and both doors are not closing automatically even after adjusting front hight.

title: Pathetic support service.
description: No one visits for installation. You have to do it your own. Warranty is just for sake of giving it. My refrigerator started malfunctioning within just 15 days of getting it. And after 100s of calls no one visited at all. DO NOT BUY any AMAZON BASICS PRODUCTS!!!

title: Bad compressor
description: Bought thia fridge from Amazon under the BPL banner in 2018. Didnt even last 4 yrs. Compressor not working amd BPL has 2 call center guys who attend the toll free and you will be able to speak to them one in millionth try. No ticket will be raised and no intimation. So service or spares doeany exist at all. Now the same product is called Amazon basics. Please avoid buying it. Like any other chinese, lucky as long as it works. Sold for scrap value rs.2000 only.

Compressor not working amd BPL has 2 call center guys who attend the toll free and you will be able to speak to them one in millionth try. No ticket will be raised and no intimation. So service or spares doeany exist at all. Now the same product is called Amazon basics. Please avoid buying it. Like any other chinese, lucky as long as it works. Sold for scrap value rs.2000 only.

title: Very Plastic like
description: I was tracking this fridge for months . When i saw the fridge upclose i found it very much like a toy no sturdiness very low quality. Insides are made of plastic and you can feel parts moving

title: GO FOR IT
description: The refrigerator works fine. Its indeed a good choice to make. The one thing I noted is - sometimes there would be water stored in the heater fitted (coil) tank. The heater is installed to make the water evaporate. Not sure why that water logging happens though. (Maybe because we have a lot of voltage fluctuation and we have no stabilizer). Still the refrigerator functions good and theres no problem at all after a month usage. The deep freeze is really strong !

title: Good design, inferior materials
description: Returned this in 1 day. The design is great: a nice big rollout bin for produce. But the inside plastic looks cheap and breakable. It came with 3 cracks when delivered. And the vent thing at the bottom came off and wouldn't snap back in. Open the door for a little bit and the shelves get all wet from the condensation. It stays that way for hours -- a slimy wetness. The edges of the shelves of "toughened glass" are a little bendable (not good material). I knew this product wouldn't last long so I exchanged it for a less "cool" brand and model.

title: Not good 😐 product.
